name: Kanjou no Hana ~The Flower of Feelings~
name_original: Kanjou no Hana ~The Flower of Feelings~
description:
Story:

A legend said; “Your feelings will reach. Under the Giant Pink Flower. Yours will Bloom.” Many people decode this as “If you confess to your love one under the giant sakura tree your feelings will be answered.” However, there are many different kinds of feelings; love, hate, anger, jealousy, admiration, honesty and many more. What if… you can see those feelings in a form of a flower within someone? What if those feelings didn’t bloom? Or it is really need to bloom? What will happen if those feelings wither? Miyano Karen, our protagonist, one day, due to a certain event, suddenly saw these feelings. She also met two persons; Sakuranomi Ayami, the school chairperson granddaughter but she held a big problem hidden in her heart, and Sakurai Yurika, an aggressive but really kind girl with hidden talent that no one knows. The two of them have a bud of flower but even Mika still don’t know what flower will be it. However, without knowing, meeting the two of them will put herself in her own demise. What will she do? Can she escape her own demise? Will she help the two of them bloom whatever their flower is? Or she will just let it be? But they are not just the one. She met persons with different kinds of feelings; a person with loneliness, person with a feeling of admiration but can’t express their true feelings and end up hurting the other person, there is also a teacher that fall in love with a student but knowing that the student will not be happy if the feeling must not be known. And while Miyano Karen and company, like it or not, when they help all this persons they unknowingly learned the truth behind the history of the school and the reason why the Giant Sakura Tree is no longer blooming.
